title: Photostat, ca. 1909
medium: Photostat and brown ink on paper
signed: Signed, bottom right: DRESSEE PAR L'ARCHITECTE SOUSSIGNE/ PARIS LE   190/ Hector Guimard
inscribed:
Signed, bottom right: DRESSEE PAR L'ARCHITECTE SOUSSIGNE/ PARIS LE   190/ Hector Guimard
Inscribed top: HOTEL GUIMARD VILLA FLORE PROPRIETE 122 RUE MOZART
Inscribed upper right corner: NO. 8
description: Drawing of Hotel Guimard at rue Mozart. Drawing indicates elevation and facade of building. Inscriptions at top and bottom right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photostat, ca. 1909.
ca. 1909. Photostat and brown ink on paper. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-89.
